name: Facebook green edition
description:
Change blue facebook color to green color by Zobar.
Please join Facebook group: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=122318714457

RED EDITION: http://userstyles.org/styles/19828
PINK EDITION: http://userstyles.org/styles/19806
ORANGE EDITION: http://userstyles.org/styles/19905
BLACK EDITION: http://userstyles.org/styles/19906
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("facebook.com") {

a,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5
{color: #054900 !important;}

#fb_menubar,
#fb_menubar #fb_menubar_logo a span,
#universal_search #universal_search_input #q,
.fb_menu_dropdown .apps small,
.fb_menu_dropdown .account small,
.fb_menu_dropdown .privacy small,
.s_and_h_big .share_a
{background-image: url('http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/8904/topgreen.png') !important;}

.inputtext, .inputpassword,
.fb_menu_dropdown,
#universal_search #universal_search_submit a,
.UIActionButton_BlueBack .UIActionButton_Wrap,
.UIActionButton_SuppressButton:hover,
.share_and_hide .share_a,
.dropdown_menu .menu_content,
#fs_dropdown .dropdown_menu_header_shadow .menu_content,
#fb_multi_friend_selector #friends a:hover .square
{border-color: #054900 !important;}

#universal_search #universal_search_submit a span
{background-color: #6AA965 !important;
background-image: url('http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/8904/topgreen.png') !important;}

.fb_menu_dropdown .fb_menu_item a:hover,
#presence_bar .presence_menu_opts h2,
.inputbutton,
.inputsubmit,
.profile .top_bar ul.tabs li a.tab_link:hover,
.toggle_tabs li.first a.selected,
.toggle_tabs li.last a.selected,
.toggle_tabs li a.selected,
.share_and_hide .share_a:hover,
td.pop_content h2.dialog_title,
.pop_content h2.dialog_title,
#tabs .activetab a,
#fb_multi_friend_selector #friends li.selected .square,
.pagerpro .pagerpro_a:hover,
.pop_content h2 span
{border-color: #054900 !important;
background-color: #6AA965 !important;}

.UIButton_Blue,
#fb_multi_friend_selector #friends li.selected a:hover,
#fb_multi_friend_selector #friends li.selected a
{border-color: #054900 !important;
background-color: #6AA965 !important;
background-image: none !important;}

#fb_menubar_core .fb_menu a:hover,
#fb_menubar_aux .fb_menu a:hover
{background-color: #6AA965 !important;}

#fb_menubar .fb_menu a,
#tabs .activetab a,
.pop_content h2 span
{color: #FFFFFF !important;}

.fbpage_profile .admins li
{color: #054900 !important;}

.UIFilterList_EditIcon,
.UIFilterList .UIObject_SelectedItem,
.UIObject_SelectedItem .UIFilterList_ItemRight,
.UIFilterList_DragHandle
{background-image: url('http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/8331/filtergreen.gif') !important;}

.UIFilterList_Item .UIFilterList_ItemLink:hover,
.profile .top_bar ul.tabs li a.tab_link,
.PillFilter_pillfilter .PillFilter_filter.Tabset_selected div,
#tabs .inactivetab a:hover,
#fb_multi_friend_selector #friends a:hover
{background-color: #C6E2C4 !important;
color: #FFFFFF !important;
background-image: none !important;}

.UIObject_SelectedItem .UIFilterList_ItemLink:hover,
#fb_menubar_core #fb_menubar_logo a:hover
{background: transparent !important;}

.UIObjectListing_RemoveLink:hover
{background-image: url('http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4182/objectgreen.gif') !important;
background-position: -168px -83px !important;}

.profile .top_bar ul.tabs li a.tab_link:focus,
.profile .top_bar ul.tabs li.selected a.tab_link
{background-color: #FFFFFF !important;
color: #054900 !important;}

.UIProfileBox_Header,
.profile .box h3.box_header,
#fb_multi_friend_selector .filters .view_on a:hover,
#fb_multi_friend_selector .filters a.drop_menu_enabled
{background-color: #E7FEE6 !important;
border-top-color: #C6E2C4 !important;}

.actionspro .actionspro_a:hover,
.profile_actions a:hover,
.dropdown_menu a:hover,
.link_menu .menu_content a:hover,
.link_menu_list .menu_content ul li a.tab_link:hover,
.profile .info_tab .edit_mode h3,
.profile .info_tab.edit_all_mode h3
{background-color: #E7FEE6 !important;}

.group_narrow_column_boxes,
.profile .box_column,
.tab_bar,
.pagerpro .current .pagerpro_a
{border-bottom-color: #C6E2C4 !important;}

.profile .box
{border-top-color: #C6E2C4 !important;}

.profile .box h3.box_header a.box_editor:hover,
.profile .basic_info_summary a.box_editor:hover,
.profile .blurb a.edit_link:hover,
.profile .box h3.box_header a.selected,
.profile .basic_info_summary a.selected
{background-image: url('http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/8331/filtergreen.gif') !important;
background-position: -0px -70px !important;}

}
